tool_description: Provides cheapest electricity hours (considering electricity and transport) in NordPool Baltics area. Can use this to schedule your time-shiftable energy consumption like floor heating and water boilers or electric car charging.
name: energy Optimizer
title: energy Optimizer

api_list.name: Get hours_available
api_list.description:
**Returns** : json of chepaest hours info, for future time interval
Parameters: 
**country** - one of supported 2-letter formats
**count** - number of hours to return
**start_time** - ISO formatted with time offset, like 2022-11-28T18:00:00+02:00, default next hour
**end_time** - ISO formatted with time offset, like 2022-11-28T18:00:00+02:00, default end of available prices

api_list.name: Get hours
api_list.description:
**Returns** : json of chepaest hours, for full periods (past time included), depending period parameter
Parameters:
**country** - one of supported 2-letter formats
**count** - number of hours to return
**period** - may be one of 0 - today (default), 1 - tomorrow, 2 - today and tomorrow

api_list.name: About
api_list.description: Return version and data last updated info
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://energy-optimizer.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "energy-optimizer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://energy-optimizer.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "energy-optimizer.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
